import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import Sobj from './Sobj' const InputSection = () => { const [array, setarray] = useState([]) const handleSubmit = () => { let iName = document.getElementById('idName').value let iDetails = document.getElementById('idDetails').value let iAmount = document.getElementById('idAmount').value let iDate = document.getElementById('idDate').value if (iAmount!==''){ let newArray = { sname: iName, sdetails: iDetails, samount: iAmount, sdate: iDate } setarray(newArray) } } return ( <>
) } export default InputSection
